description: Easily set the text color and style in the terminal.
name: colorette

scripts.build: node -e "fs.writeFileSync('index.cjs', fs.readFileSync('index.js', 'utf8').replace(/export const /g, 'exports.').replace(/import \* as ([^ ]+) from \"(.+)\"/, 'const \$1 = require(\"\$2\")'), 'utf8')"
scripts.deploy: npm test && git commit --all --message $tag && git tag --sign $tag --message $tag && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release: tag=$npm_package_version npm run deploy && npm publish --access public
